docs.snippet: The Fifty-first Congress, with its billion scattered in every direction, made only a moderate contribution to the work of national defense by land and sea. It pared down the conservative estimates for the army gun factory. It made a liberal provision...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Fifty-first Congress, with its billion scattered in every direction, made only a moderate contribution to the work of national defense by land and sea. It pared down the conservative estimates for the army gun factory. It made a liberal provision for the new navy during its first session, but in the second authorized only one new ship, although that, to be sure, was the costly triple-screw cruiser No. 13.

docs.snippet: Mr. Brewster's career, as here laid bare, is an inspiring one. He was a lawyer, man of letters, politician, and Cabinet officer in his time, and to these honors he rose by the force of native talent that had been repressed by peculiar obstacles. Mr....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Brewster's career, as here laid bare, is an inspiring one. He was a lawyer, man of letters, politician, and Cabinet officer in his time, and to these honors he rose by the force of native talent that had been repressed by peculiar obstacles. Mr. Brewster was descended from the well-known colonial New-England family, and early entered upon a life of hardship quite worthy of the early history of his ancestral line.

headline.main: NEW PUBLICATIONS; MR. BREWSTER OF PHILADELPHIA. LIFE OF BENJAMIN HARRIS BREWSTER. With Discourses and Addresses. By Eugene Coleman Savidge, M.D. Philadelphia: J.B. Lippincott Company. 1891.

docs.snippet: The estimates made by Secretary TRACY for new naval construction during the next fiscal year are so moderate that even a Congress bent on economy may wisely sanction them in its appropriations. In fact, while frugality is properly the watchword for...
docs.lead_paragraph: The estimates made by Secretary TRACY for new naval construction during the next fiscal year are so moderate that even a Congress bent on economy may wisely sanction them in its appropriations. In fact, while frugality is properly the watchword for the successor of the Billion Congress, our navy is not the branch of the Government which should feel the effects of this general policy.
docs.abstract: Vessels Needed; Appropriation Should Not Be Restricted

docs.snippet: The Paris courts have decided that the heirs of the Countess Civry are entitled to a share of the Duke of Brunswick's estate. The City of Geneva, where the Duke died childless in 1872, fought the claim, and is condemned to pay the costs.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Paris courts have decided that the heirs of the Countess Civry are entitled to a share of the Duke of Brunswick's estate. The City of Geneva, where the Duke died childless in 1872, fought the claim, and is condemned to pay the costs.

docs.snippet: The troubles in Brazil have evidently not been composed by the change in the Central Government. The disturbances now reported are in the same State, Rio Grande do Sul, the condition of which was the most serious of the difficulties of DA FONSECA....
docs.lead_paragraph: The troubles in Brazil have evidently not been composed by the change in the Central Government. The disturbances now reported are in the same State, Rio Grande do Sul, the condition of which was the most serious of the difficulties of DA FONSECA. The appointment to this State of a new and popular Governor was expected to have a great effect in allaying discontent, and for a time seemed to be doing so.
docs.abstract: Rio Grande do Sul; Secession Disturbances
